item.description:
This a birthday celebration dinner for those members born in January. (2 members so far)

Their dinner is free (split between other members of the group attending). So come on everyone! RSVP "yes" so the organizer doesn't get stuck with the tab!!! Ha ha ha.

Meet at 6:30 - 7pm.

P.S. If your birthday is in February (like your Organizer), please let Linda Karen know. View the Calendar. We already have a date and place for this birthday party!

We will do this EVERY month!!!

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: HAPPY BIRTHDAY TO YOU! - January Birthday Dinner at Agave Grill in Hartford
